description.message: Lets you increment [+] or decrement [-] numbers in a URL

title.description: Extension title (tool tip) shown when hovered.

setup_h3.message: Select the part of the URL to Increment [+] or Decrement [-]

selection_notalphanumeric_error.message: Selection can only contain alphanumeric characters

selection_notinurl_error.message: Selection has to be part of the URL

selection_toolarge_error.message: Selection is too large; please select a smaller number or fewer characters

selection_base_error.message: Select a higher base to match characters in selection

selectionstart_invalid_error.message: Selection position must be from URL

interval_invalid_error.message: Interval has to be 1 or higher

auto_times_invalid_error.message: If using auto, the times count must be between 1 and 1000

auto_seconds_invalid_error.message: If using auto, the seconds must be between 2 and 100

permissions_disabled_p.message: Aw, if you would like to use URLI's fully featured internal shortcuts or enable extra functions like auto-incrementing, click the button below to grant URLI with the extra permissions it needs to use its own shortcuts code.

permissions_enabled_p.message: Sweet! URLI's extra functionality is currently enabled. If you decide you don't need it, you can click the button below to go back to square one, remove permissions, and bring back Chrome shortcuts.

optional_permissions_request_button.message: Enable Internal Shortcuts + Extra Functions (Grant Permissions)

optional_permissions_remove_button.message: Disable Internal Shortcuts + Extra Functions (Revoke Permissions)

chrome_shortcuts_p.message: URLI is currently set to use Chrome Shortcuts. If Quick is enabled, you can Increment [+] or perform the action instantly without having to enter Setup.

internal_shortcuts_p.message: URLI is currently set to use its internal shortcuts. Click on the text boxes and press the key(s) you'd like to set. Any combination of the Alt, Ctrl, Shift, and Meta modifier keys can be used. Left/Middle/Right Mouse Buttons can also be set as shortcuts. If Quick is enabled, you can Increment [+] or perform the action instantly without having to enter setup.

icon_feedback_enable_label.message: Enable icon feedback when incrementing or from other actions

animations_enable_label.message: Enable Hover.css CSS3 Animations in UI

selection_option_prefixes.message: Select numbers in the URL with prefixes like =123 and /456

selection_option_lastnumber.message: Select the last number in the URL

selection_option_firstnumber.message: Select the first number in the URL

selection_option_custom.message: Use a custom JavaScript regular expression

selection_custom_help_label.message: For more testing and help, use

selection_custom_matchgroup_error.message: Match found, but not in group entered

selection_custom_matchindex_error.message: Match found, but not in index entered

links_innerHTML_option.message: Prefer links with words like "Next" in them

same_domain_policy_enable_label.message: Only use links from the same domain of the current page

feedback_p.message: Discovered a bug? Have a feature request? Or just feedback to make things better? I'd really, really (yes, really!) appreciate it if you could

urli_thank_you.message: URLI says "Thank you" for using this extension!
